pages.text: Padum le dilee ka peubinasa Nyang teuga-teuga beuho sileupah Leubeh beuho jih nibak awaknyoe Padum le nanggroe ka di jeulajah Ho jikeumeung plueng teuma uroe nyoe
Bandum atra nyoe tatueng phaedah Jeut keupeuingat keu soe nyang pike Nyang na lam ate sipheut meutuah Nyang got jideungo peue nyang jikalon
Kamoe pakriban kuasa leupah Ka Kamoe peujeut langet ngon bumoe Ngon bandum asoe keubit that bagah Meupeujeut bandum dalam nam uroe Teuma di Kamoe hana meupayah
Teuma tasaba jikheun barangpeue Di gata pujoe mantong keu Allah Takheun teuseubeh tapujoe Tuhan Uroe ngon malam sabe di babah Beungoh yoh goh teubiet uroe Goh jilop uroe pih bek takeubah
Takheun teuseubeh lom watee malam â€˜Oh lheuh seumbahyang sujud bak Allah
Beu got tadeungo watee geumeuhoi Le ureueng meuhoi nyang toe sileupah
Uroe nyan bandum deungo su raya Su sangka kala cit hana salah Beuna that nyan keuh uroe geunbangket
Kamoe peuudep bandum cit mudah Kamoe peuudep Kamoe peumate Meuwoe keudeh le bandum bak Allah Bandum teuh teuma tawoe bak Kamoe
Beukah ngon bumoe teubiet dum bagah Meusapat bandum teuma bak Kamoe Teuma atra nyoe leupah that mudah
Teuma Kamoe roe nyang leubeh teupue Bah barangkapeue peue nyang jipeugah Hana kreuh gata teuma ateuh jih Tapeuingat jih hana phaedah Deungon Qur'an nyoe tapeuingat Ureueng that takot janji Lon peugah
Demi dum kapai jijak mudah that
Keubit nyang janji geubri keu gata Leupah that beuna hana meusalah
